[NEC]

10/12sprintf cil handling.  Solution: 1. update stubimpl.h/.c in bin/config (where is the original place?)  2. update fsft_string_checker.h 3. comment out *string_checker.c *. side effect: without --cil-edg-plus-fsoft, cil reported error on strlen().  The reason is that edgcil will write strlen() to strlen(int *i, str), which is different from fsoft rewriting - strlen(int, str). so, no matter what, let’s fsoft do first (no matter this flag is used or not).  Also, for the simpleSwitch/availExpression, removed due to modeling of the error blocks.
08/18,19changed the bmc_nf on merging according to Franjo’s suggestion.  Run regression and generate reports.
